data.message: Why is it that there is NO customer service available , no replies to emails or questions, some times HUMAN help is needed, I would appreciate a bit of customer service  it certainly should be provided consdering the money Facebook makes or at the very least a way to contact a real Person!!!!

replies.message: Hi Nancy. How can we help you? - Elissa

I lost a ID because i did not have my name right, I have a group that id was the ONLY id as admin,, Now there is NO admin or if there is it is someone that has no business being, I cannot monitor that group  now,,or make changes etc     **** i guess how you can help me is have better customer service, ONE ON ONE, email or phone contact, this is just ridiculous
como vos quieras venir ah mi casa ah visitarme al maipu 268    ciudad atlantida
